analysis.key_quote: I sincerely hope that the professional staff will have stable careers and that their experience and wisdom will be kept from the instability brought by political reappointments that may be subjects of recurrent changes that may come with electoral processes.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the potential instability and loss of experienced staff due to political reappointments, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule's implications for politicization of civil service.
